resources.string: This service is responsible to showing an overlay to set and restore a refresh speed for the eink display. Eink Center is open-source. You can check the source code at \n https://github.com/denzilferreira/vendor_hisense

Using the Eink Button
 - Press Eink button once quickly to refresh.
 - Open an app, press twice quickly to select and save an app speed.
 - Hold and release for 1 second to open Eink Center.

 Did you know?
 - Eink Center restores automatically the last speed you set for an app.
 - Tweak an app speed from Eink Center.
 - Swipe to remove an app from the list.
